headline: Ask HN: How to report a spammer website on Google?
description:
Website: codegrepper.com

Recently when I search programing keywords, that website often get very hight position on the search result page. But it has very low quality. The pages on the website were crawled from StackOverflow. Question&Answers are incomplete and sometimes not related. It is really annoying.
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 如何在谷歌上报告一个垃圾邮件的网站？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 如何在谷歌上報告一個垃圾郵件的網站？
description_zh-Hans:
网站：codegrepper.com

最近，当我搜索编程关键词时，该网站经常在搜索结果页上获得很高的位置。但它的质量非常低。该网站的页面是从StackOverflow上抓取的。问题&答案不完整，有时不相关。这真的很让人讨厌。
description_zh-Hant:
網站：codegrepper.com

最近，當我搜索編程關鍵詞時，該網站經常在搜索結果頁上獲得很高的位置。但它的質量非常低。該網站的頁面是從StackOverflow上抓取的。問題&答案不完整，有時不相關。這真的很讓人討厭。
